title: Hey, Can You Guys Like, Fix The Chroma Bug in Teambuilder Where it Doesnt Show Up If You Dont Swap?
body:
Back and forth? 

I didn't do it because I thought it was fixed. Because, you know, this is old.

Way to fuck over people's hopes Riot.

Go fuck yourselves. You're being paid to do a job, the fix can't be that hard to do, get off your lazy asses and do it in a lunch break or something thanks.
